summary.span: 無需進行組態即可在 Managed 裝載環境中自動新增 ASP.NET AJAX 端點至服務，這個環境可動態啟動服務的裝載執行個體以回應傳入的訊息。

span.span: Automatically adds an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint to a service, without requiring configuration, in a managed hosting environment that dynamically activates host instances for the service in response to incoming messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此處理站提供了不需組態即可新增 ASP.NET AJAX 端點至服務的方式。This factory provides a way to add an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint to a service without requiring configuration. 端點會新增至組態中定義的任何其他端點 (如果有的話)。The endpoint is added to any other endpoints that are defined in configuration, if any. 支援這類動態裝載啟動的 Managed 裝載環境包括網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 和 Windows Process Activation Services (WAS)。The managed hosting environments that support this type of dynamic host activation are Internet Information Services (IIS) and Windows Process Activation Services (WAS). 若要使用此處理站，指定中`Factory`屬性[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md)指示詞。To use this factory, specify the in the `Factory` attribute of the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive. 此處理站所建立的 ASP.NET AJAX 端點設定了 和 ，以及所有預設設定。The ASP.NET AJAX endpoint created by this factory is configured with the and the , with all the default settings. 端點是在與 .svc 檔相對的空白位址上設定。The endpoint is created at an empty address relative to the .svc file. 如果服務組態已經在此位址上定義端點，就會擲回 ，而服務也會無法啟動。If service configuration already defines an endpoint at this address, an is thrown and the service fails to start. ## Examples 指定的值`Factory`屬性中[ @ServiceHost ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md)指示詞，以啟用 ASP.NET AJAX 端點的`MyService`服務在下列範例所示。Specify the for the value of the `Factory` attribute in the [@ServiceHost](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf-directive/servicehost.md) directive to activate an ASP.NET AJAX endpoint for the `MyService` service as shown in the following example. ``` <% @ServiceHost Service="MyService" Language="C#" Debug="true" Factory="WebScriptServiceHostFactory" %> ```
